gov.usgs.anss.util

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.anss.util.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulate the notion of a user of the system per the inventory system. This could be used in other GUIs if a person file is created an maintained.

        return true if the user has any of the roles in the string list
